item.title: Functional neurological disorders
item.description: One of my main professional interest areas is in the treatment of functional symptoms. This Work stream is subsequently devoted to clinical practice, research and education around functional symptoms.

item.title: Single case design
item.description: This is a project dedicated to advancing the application are single case experimental design within routine practice of psychotherapy.
